评论概述: This dress is fits well not snug.
评论详情: If you are 5'7" between 125-140 lbs this dress, it fits but I can't imagine this fitting me if I was ten pounds lighter. The waist area would be too loose. There is a hidden zipper on the side.  The chest area is designed, very, very well. I am on the smaller side in the chest area. That's the only reason that it didn't fall down on me.  The color is very nice, and the seams and stitching are well done. I don’t see this fraying unless my cat managed to get to it. The dress is also lightweight (but lots of layers) and it is opaque not see-through.  Overall a gorgeous dress but if you are a size small like me and are 20lbs lighter this might not fit.

The fabric is lovely. I love the pattern and the way it flows and breathes. It’s perfect for staying cute while beating the summer heat! My main issues are with the waistline and the straps. The waistline feels a bit frumpy. I wish there was more shape to it, because as is it either disappears under my bust or bunched up in unflattering ways as I move. The straps are too short to be comfortable worn up on the shoulders, but there’s really no way to keep them from becoming twisted if you wear them off the shoulder. I also wish the slit was either a bit higher or a bit lower - maybe it’s just me, but the height it hit was just a bit awkward on me. I definitely would not recommend paying $40 for this, but it worked for what I needed it for on short notice!

评论概述: The prettiest dress I've ever worn. But the zipper broke after only wearing it once.
评论详情: It was a very pretty dress and flows so nicely when you walk outside in the summer breeze. I wanted to wear it again for a party, but some of the teeth in the zipper had broken off (around where the elastic waist is) and now will no longer zip up. For $50-60, I expect a dress to be worn multiple times at the least, no matter how pretty it is. I can't return it, but I can do my best to learn from this experience and pay more attention to the quality of materials in the products and how they are arranged in its design. I don't think such a weak zipper should have been used on the side of the dress, because it is the weakest point in the structure. The part of the dress with the elastic waist has thicker material and stitching there, casuing a high amount of tension on the zipper in addition to the stress caused by a person wearing the dress. I strongly recommend upgrading the zipper. Even if I had to pay 10 extra dollars for a zipper that didn't break as easily, that is far better than only wearing it once and realizing you can't wear it anymore.

I received so many compliments on it, and even without outside validation, this is seriously my favorite dress. It fit great. I’m 5’2”, 200 lb. An XL was perfect. 评论概述: Weird fit and material choice, looks like a nightgown
评论详情: This dress is not flattering, and appears more suited for sleepwear than street wear.  On the positive side, the floral pattern is very pretty, and the off-shoulder straps are cute. They can be worn up, or off the shoulder. In either case though, you can’t wear a bra with regular straps—they would show. The dress does look okay from a distance, and it’s an okay maxi dress.  On the negative side, the dress is poorly designed. It fits poorly, and looks cheap up close.  In the stock photos, the dress looks like cotton, however it is a floral chiffon lined with cheap polyester. The chiffon is nice, but it doesn’t suit the style of dress. It looks more formal that the dress does. The ruched elastic waist is not snug in real life, so the bodice just hangs looking very mediocre at best, and certainly not stylish. Furthermore, the bust is very large, but with the ruching not being snug, there is not enough support for anyone who could fill out the top. Even the sweetheart neckline sits too high on the chest. Below the ruching, the skirt flares out, accentuating the girth of waist and hips. It does not slim or flatter one’s figure, and the knee-high slit does not add anything to the look.  Overall, the dress is made of decent material, but the loose waist and odd fit of bodice render the dress cheap looking and more like a nightgown than a flattering dress.

评论概述: I wish there would have been four and a half stars

The sleeves that are shown to be off The shoulder, on me it does not look as good as it does in the pictures displayed for advertisement. I will Figure out something to make it accommodate me but currently that is the only hold up as to why I do not give five stars. I am in good To average in my build. I am 5'6 1/2 &150 lbs This is one of two dresses that I purchased for a birthday gift for myself. I look forward to wearing it for an event. I hope to resolve the issue with the shoulder straps. I am not very busty and for this to fit me without needing the straps is a big deal to me in a good way. So often I cannot wear anything off the shoulder because it gaps.Or falls off, this dress fits me beautifully Other than the shoulder strap issue and i'm very excited about that.

I like the different ways you can wear this, with being able to keep the straps up or draped over the shoulder (sometimes, though, the straps do droop down).  The print from the picture and what I actually got do seem to differ a little, with what I got looking a little cheaper than the print in the picture (but the picture doesn't have a good close up).  It fits true to size and the silky material is comfortable.  I do think this is a little pricey for the item, but it is a good summer piece.

Just received last night and I was wowed at the fact that it’s a beautiful well made dress . It is long and flowy . The print is clear and color is soft. It runs true to size and can be worn with sleeves up or off the shoulder.

I have to be honest, when I ordered this I only hoped it would look nice, but I really didn't think it would- it was just so pretty I had to try it. When it arrived it definitely had some weight to it so I knew it would be quality! This dress is everything and more and I don't think my review could possibly do it justice. I am 3 months pregnant so I'm in that stage where I'm not showing but I feel so bloated and nothing looks good, I ordered a large which I need in some things but others seem to swim in that size, considering a growing belly I thought large would be good. I'm not sure how to describe how the fit was- the large fit great! It had plenty of room so I could easily grow in it, but I wasn't swimming it. It was a beautiful flattering fit, that I could have honestly probably went down a size in, but the bigger size for once felt PERFECT- which is hard to explain. Has a beautiful fit on the bust, and then an area of smocking right under which gives a fitted look. The skirt is then flowy from there down and it so beautiful and flattering I feel on any body type. Has a slit but isn't too revealing it's absolutely perfect. The bust also has that rubber banding around the top to help keep it in place so it doesn't slide down, although I don't really feel like it's necessary. The straps seem as though they could be worn on the shoulders, but is beautiful on or off which just makes this dress versatile! I really can't give enough credit to it this is one of those dresses you just have to buy and then feel like a princess when it comes in! Order it!

This dress is comfortable, but it runs smalls in the chest area and has no stretch to it, so if you're large chested, then you should go with the next size up. It's soft and cool, and it looks and feels very well made, though.
Fits perfect, true to size

评论概述: GRACE KARIN Women's Floral Print Dress.  The purple floral is pretty.
评论详情: GRACE KARIN Women's Floral Print Dress.  The purple floral is pretty.I really like the Grace Karin dress in the purple floral.  Went with the medium size after checking the size chart.  It works out well for fit but is a bit long.  I am short at 5’2” so to be expected for me.  The dress is really pretty and well made.  It has a nice purple built in slip and looks good. I love the sweetheart neckline, and the Empire waste on this dress. It is very well known with no raw edges and a finishing stitch. The colors are a nice, soft, muted nothing too flashy. It hits right at the ankles. It’s a perfect length. it’s lightweight and will be good for summer. It was nicely in the washing machine. There was no fading or bleeding of the colors. It is true to fit size. Match it with a pair of cute flat sandals and you got a terrific outfit.

I took a risk buying this dress when it didn’t have any reviews. I needed a size large but had to get an xl since they were out of stock. It’s definitely worth taking to a seamstress to get taken in. It’s the perfect dress as a bridesmaid in my friends wedding this summer.

I recently purchased the GRACE KARIN Summer Floral Print Flowy A Line Dress, and I am absolutely thrilled with my purchase! This dress exceeded my expectations in every way, making it a must-have for any summer wardrobe.  The floral print is vibrant and eye-catching, adding a touch of elegance to the overall design. The flowy A-line silhouette not only looks beautiful but also provides a comfortable and flattering fit. I love how it effortlessly drapes down, creating a feminine and graceful look that is perfect for various occasions.  The sleeveless design and smocked off-shoulder detail give this dress a trendy and stylish feel, making it ideal for both casual outings and more formal events. The versatility of the dress allows me to dress it up or down, depending on the occasion, making it a true wardrobe staple.  One of the standout features is the maxi length, which adds a touch of sophistication while keeping me cool and comfortable during the warmer months. The quality of the fabric is excellent – it's lightweight, breathable, and feels luxurious against the skin.  I also appreciate the attention to detail in the construction of this dress. The stitching is impeccable, ensuring durability and longevity. The dress arrived promptly, and the sizing was spot on, making the online shopping experience a breeze.  Overall, I highly recommend the GRACE KARIN 2024 Women's Summer Floral Print Flowy A Line Dress to anyone looking for a stylish, comfortable, and versatile piece for their summer wardrobe. I've received numerous compliments every time I wear it, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase!
